A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi pulled off combining the spirit of the old Star Wars with the freshness and innovation needed for a new century. I was on the edge of my seat\, laughing and crying and being completely enchanted. Especially about General Leia and Admiral Holdo -- I never thought I would encounter a Star Wars character that I could identify with as much as I did with them. The rest of the cast was flawless\, and the visuals as amazing as that first look at two suns setting a long time ago\, in the movie that started this.
